title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for November 4, 2024
description: All the solutions for the November 4 episode. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for November 4, 2024 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle for November 4, 2024, plus the solutions to the other puzzles in the episode.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer for November 4, 2024. We will also show today’s answers for every tossup and standard puzzle throughout the episode, but we’ll provide the solution for the bonus round puzzle first. Today’s match will feature contestants Darren Thornton, Jamella Baker-Bey, and Kenneth Blount-Hames. Fans of Pat Sajak as the game’s host, instead of Ryan Seacrest, should look out for the special December 2 episode for Celebrity Wheel of Fortune. Here are all of the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for November 4. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Monday, November 4, 2024 and the categories (in parentheses) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – WE HAVE THAT IN COMMON (Phrase) Tossup #1 – TOWERING SKYSCRAPER (Place) Tossup #2 – INFLUENCER (Person) Regular Puzzle #1 – BUSES, TRAINS, SUBWAYS, TAXIS (Things) Regular Puzzle #2 – THE WORLD IS YOUR OYSTER CRACKER (Before & After) Regular Puzzle #3 – IT’S BEEN A BANNER YEAR (Phrase) Tossup #3 – VANILLA LATTE (Food & Drink) Tossup #4 – MOCHA CAPPUCCINO (Food & Drink) Tossup #5 – ESPRESSO MARTINI (Food & Drink) Regular Puzzle #4 – PITTSBURGH, PENNSYLVANIA (On the Map) As a recap of yesterday’s episode, here are the puzzle answers for Friday, November 1: Bonus Round Puzzle – ROOMY CONDO (Place) Tossup #1 – ROLLING IN THE DEEP (Song Title) Tossup #2 – PLAYING WATER POLO (Fun & Games) Regular Puzzle #1 – UNBELIEVABLE LOCATION (Place) Regular Puzzle #2 – COFFEE, AMBITION, SOUP, TEA (Cup of What?) Regular Puzzle #3 – CHICKEN-FRIED STEAK SMOTHERED IN GRAVY (Food & Drink) Tossup #3 – SCHOOL NEWSPAPER (Thing) Tossup #4 – TERM PAPER (Thing) Tossup #5 – PAPER AIRPLANE (Thing) Regular Puzzle #4 – THIS IS MY KIND OF PLACE (Phrase) The Fan Friday contest is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be available on November 8 this week.
html:
Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer for November 4, 2024. We will also show today’s answers for every tossup and standard puzzle throughout the episode, but we’ll provide the solution for the bonus round puzzle first. Today’s match will feature contestants Darren Thornton, Jamella Baker-Bey, and Kenneth Blount-Hames. Fans of Pat Sajak as the game’s host, instead of Ryan Seacrest, should look out for the special December 2 episode for Celebrity Wheel of Fortune. Here are all of the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for November 4.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Monday, November 4, 2024 and the categories (in parentheses) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – WE HAVE THAT IN COMMON (Phrase)
  • Tossup #1 – TOWERING SKYSCRAPER (Place)
  • Tossup #2 – INFLUENCER (Person)
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – BUSES, TRAINS, SUBWAYS, TAXIS (Things)
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – THE WORLD IS YOUR OYSTER CRACKER (Before & After)
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – IT’S BEEN A BANNER YEAR (Phrase)
  • Tossup #3 – VANILLA LATTE (Food & Drink)
  • Tossup #4 – MOCHA CAPPUCCINO (Food & Drink)
  • Tossup #5 – ESPRESSO MARTINI (Food & Drink)
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – PITTSBURGH, PENNSYLVANIA (On the Map)

As a recap of yesterday’s episode, here are the puzzle answers for Friday, November 1:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – ROOMY CONDO (Place)
  • Tossup #1 – ROLLING IN THE DEEP (Song Title)
  • Tossup #2 – PLAYING WATER POLO (Fun & Games)
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – UNBELIEVABLE LOCATION (Place)
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – COFFEE, AMBITION, SOUP, TEA (Cup of What?)
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – CHICKEN-FRIED STEAK SMOTHERED IN GRAVY (Food & Drink)
  • Tossup #3 – SCHOOL NEWSPAPER (Thing)
  • Tossup #4 – TERM PAPER (Thing)
  • Tossup #5 – PAPER AIRPLANE (Thing)
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – THIS IS MY KIND OF PLACE (Phrase)

The Fan Friday contest is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be available on November 8 this week.
